echopype.convert.ek60Â¶

Functions to unpack Simrad EK60 .raw and save to .nc.

Pieces for unpacking power data came from: https://github.com/oceanobservatories/mi-instrument (authors: Ronald Ronquillo & Richard Han) with modifications: - python 3.6 compatibility - strip off dependency on other mi-instrument functions - unpack split-beam angle data - unpack various additional variables needed for calibration

Classes

ConvertEK60([_filename]) Class for converting EK60 .raw files.
